array.string: echo "$(date '+%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S') Checking socket..."; if [ -S "${COLIMA_HOME}/.colima/default/docker.sock" ]; then chgrp ${COLIMA_GROUP} "${COLIMA_HOME}/.colima/default/docker.sock" && echo "$(date '+%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S') Set group to ${COLIMA_GROUP}" && chmod 660 "${COLIMA_HOME}/.colima/default/docker.sock" && echo "$(date '+%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S') Set permissions to 660" && ln -sf "${COLIMA_HOME}/.colima/default/docker.sock" "${DOCKER_SOCK}" && echo "$(date '+%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S') Created symlink: ${DOCKER_SOCK}"; else echo "$(date '+%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S') Socket not found" >&2; fi
